lines.text: Don't you find her attractive?
Very attractive.
Single too.
Now there's a combination you don't run into very often.
I hope I didn't offend you.
Not at all, you're just one of those people who speak their mind - an over-rated virtue!
There are 2 types of people who marry for love - the very rich and the very poor.
Get going before you make me...
Make you what Mr Hunter?
Make me forget my business.
Mr Hunter what kind of joke are you joking - you went out for dinner with Maria and come back with Nina.
I asume you wish her invited to the party.
She is the party.
A man can't be a friend, he can be a brother, a father or a husband but not a friend.
Enjoying yourself Tom?
Best birthday I ever had.
Last week
[his daughter Nina was in love with]
it was the ice-box man - and the ice-box still doesn't work.
I don't drink.
You don't know what you're missing.
May I be one of the last to congratulate you.

[Song]
I don't wanna be a millionaire, I just wanna live like one.
Anton when a girl says yes, don't ask so many questions.
I want to marry your daughter.
Sorry I haven't any left.

[as they observe Ray dancing with their older sister, Maria]
Do you think he will marry her?
They only met this afternoon.
But I understand that in America, that is a *long* engagement!

[Nina is aboard Ray's private plane - her first time ever flying]
Nobody will believe me, this wonderful plane, and only you and me.
Well, don't, uh, any of your boyfriends have, uh, private planes?
Ha! They're lucky to have "Lambrettas." You know - motor scooters. You ever been on the back seat of a motor scooter?
No, not lately.

[Indicating his private plane]
*This* is better.
Is there something going on, Mr. Hunter? Is anything wrong?
Arthur, I'm in love.
That's very nice, sir.
I have to marry four girls.
[turns and exits]

[looks a bit baffled]
That's not a marriage. That's a merger.
